history.content:
I have never really enrolled in a berkeley connect course. Has anybody had experience with the Physics 198 BC ? Is it really just sit in and get your 1 unit P/NP ? Or, you actually are evaluated on some deliverables ? From below excerpt, it seems it's a 0-stress unit earning. Is that true ?

http://www.dailycal.org/2014/09/22/expect-berkeley-connect/ states:

The classes offered by Berkeley Connect emphasize the program’s informal nature by operating as one-unit, pass-fail classes with no homework, exams or tests. There are no prerequisites either, and you don’t even need to be majoring in a specific department to enroll in its Berkeley Connect class. It’s practically a free for all
history.subject: physics 198 BC (berkeley connect) workload
